about_the_game:
Elementcore Revelations：Journey Prologue is a casual RPG game that features idle leveling, synthesis and upgrading of hundreds of weapons, and a variety of treasure chests to discover. Players can choose a character and embark on a journey to visit familiar and unfamiliar locations, upgrade their character's equipment, configure talents, defeat monsters along the way, and discover the stories of each girl's journey, while uncovering the reasons behind the increasingly chaotic world.



As the first game in the Elementcore Revelations, Journey Prologue portrays the personal stories of the characters that appear in this game series. This game will allow players to experience the gameplay of one of the main characters in a free format, while other characters will gradually appear as DLC. Different characters will have different skills, talents, applicable weapons, storylines, and more. It is hoped that this character will provide players with a clearer understanding of the gameplay and a greater curiosity about the world within the game.

Suggestion: We highly discourage the use of cheat engine (CE) to expedite game progression, as it can lead to the occurrence of numerous unforeseen bugs.
QQ：341513903 ，E-mail：liuliyule@163.com

Players can choose a character and embark on a journey to visit familiar and unfamiliar locations, upgrade their character's equipment, configure talents, defeat monsters along the way, and discover the stories of each girl's journey, while uncovering the reasons behind the increasingly chaotic world.



As the first game in the Elementcore Revelations, Journey Prologue portrays the personal stories of the characters that appear in this game series. This game will allow players to experience the gameplay of one of the main characters in a free format, while other characters will gradually appear as DLC. Different characters will have different skills, talents, applicable weapons, storylines, and more. name: Elementcore Revelations: Journey Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The balance of the elements has been disrupted and long-disappeared monsters have reappeared. The youths have embarked on a dangerous journey. Join them and unravel the mystery of the royal family that has lasted for thousands of years and restore this broken world!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
